about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Urban Enviro Waste Management Limited provides Waste Management Solutions & Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) Management services.

The company's services list includes solid waste collection, transportation, segregation of waste, and processing and disposal services across the Cities in Gujarat, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, and Maharashtra, primarily catering to local municipalities. The company also carries on the activity of providing human resources like staff, workers, and skilled/semi-skilled labourers required by various industries and organizations.

The company caters to Indian Local Bodies along with providing its services to Residential Areas, Industries, Research Institutes, Power Stations, Government & Semi Government Hospitals, and Cantonment Boards to name a few.

Urban Enviro Waste Management primarily undertakes Collection & Transport projects & MSW processing projects. It has undertaken more than 24 projects to date. Out of these 21 are ongoing, which comprises 18 MSW C&T projects, and 3 MSW processing projects.

Urban Enviro Waste Management's notable ongoing projects include Jaipur Nagar Nigam, Ankleshwar, NEERI, MIHAN India Ltd, NHDC Limited Indira Sagar Power Station to name a few.

faqs.question: What is the Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO?
faqs.answer:
Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO is a SME IPO of 1142400 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.42 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹100 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on June 12, 2023, and closes on June 14, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO opens on June 12, 2023 and closes on June 14, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO?
faqs.answer: Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO will be done on Monday, June 19, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, June 21, 2023. Check the Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Urban Enviro Waste Management IPO listing date is on Thursday, June 22, 2023.
